santu nand wrote:
> 
> Hi,
> 
> Can Anybody explain me what is the function of a fail method???

You could read the source code for more detail. Simply, fail() causes a 
test to fail. Its most common use is in the test implementation pattern 
for verifying that code throws an expected exception. See 
http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?CodingJavaUnitExceptionTests
